bibl.title: Greek Imports in Egypt. Graeco-Egyptian Relations during the First Millennium B.C. (Excavations of the Czech Institute of Egyptology. Abusir. VII.)
bibl.note: Doctoral thesis. - I. Egypt and her relations with Greece during the Late Period. - II. The distribution of pottery. - III. Classification of pottery. - IV. Import or imitation. - V. The function of Greek pottery. - VI. Abusir and Saqqara as part of the Memphite Necropolis in the first millennium B.C. - VII. Literary sources and archaeological evidence. - Excursus. Mercenaries in the service of Egyptian kings. - Conclusion. - Slovenské zhrnutie. - Index. Appendix.
